designSystemProfile.name: Scale AI Dark Theme
designSystemProfile.description: A comprehensive design system based on the visual language of the Scale AI website, featuring a dark theme with vibrant, iridescent gradients.

default.notes: The entire UI uses a pure black background for maximum contrast.

h1.context: Main hero section titles like 'The future of your industry starts here'.
h1.notes: Primary headings are pure white for emphasis.

h1_gradient.context: Specific, emphasized words within H1 headings, like 'starts here' or 'Breakthrough AI'.
h1_gradient.notes: This gradient is exclusively for highlighting key terms in main titles and should never be used as a container background.

footerHeadings.context: Titles in the footer section, e.g., 'PRODUCTS', 'COMPANY'.

default.context: Subtitles or descriptive text below main headings.

footerLinks.context: Navigation links within the main site footer.

hover.notes: A subtle dimming effect on hover.
Text and icon should dim slightly on hover.

primary.context: The main call-to-action button, e.g., 'Book a Demo' in the header.

hover.notes: Slightly darkens the background on hover.

secondary.context: A secondary call-to-action, often purple-themed, e.g., 'Book a Demo' under 'Full-Stack AI Solutions'.

socialMedia.context: Social media icons located in the footer (X, Facebook, LinkedIn).

actionIcon.context: Icons paired with text links, like the arrow in 'Build AI →'.

pill.context: Small, capsule-shaped tags used for labeling sections, e.g., 'AI FOR THE ENTERPRISE'.

decorativeShapes.context: The floating, iridescent, disc-like shapes in the background of hero sections.
decorativeShapes.notes: This is a complex, multi-color gradient used purely for non-interactive, decorative background elements.

misapplicationRules.title: Critical 'DO NOT' Rules for AI Replication

rules.rule: DO NOT apply the H1 text gradient (`linear-gradient(95deg, #A969FF...)`) to any element other than text. It should never be a background for buttons, cards, or containers.
DO NOT use the decorative shape conic-gradient on interactive elements like buttons or icons.
DO NOT use footer text colors (`#A1A1A1`, `#8F8F8F`) in the main body or header sections of the page.
DO NOT apply shadows to text content. Shadows are not a feature of this design system.
DO NOT use different border-radius values for buttons. Maintain a consistent `8px` radius for all standard buttons.
